General.Name: Primetech SA
General.Description: Primetech S.A. provides drilling and geotechnical services. The company is involved in the provision of vertical, horizontal, and directional drilling services; drilling wells, reconnaissance and exploration holes, engineering holes, and large-diameter holes; and liquidation of drilling holes. It also provides geotechnical services, such as terrain drainage, cement and chemical injections, backfilling of mining voids, anchoring, and piling. The company was formerly known as Kopex S.A. and changed its name to Primetech S.A. in September 2018. Primetech S.A. was founded in 1961 and is based in Katowice, Poland. Primetech S.A. is a subsidiary of Famur SA.
